@package libiserv

module GHCi.Utils

-- | Gets a GHC Handle File description from the given OS Handle or POSIX
--   fd.
getGhcHandle :: CInt -> IO Handle

module Lib
serv :: Bool -> MessageHook -> Pipe -> (forall a. IO a -> IO a) -> IO ()
